Description:
Strong Mechanical and Basic Electrical Knowledge 
Familiar with appropriate workshop equipment and tools and capable of working with them.
Ability to read and analyse drawings and schematics, reference service manuals and understand Body related information. Aware & knowledgeable of all repair manuals
Basic PC skills.
Good communication skills (both written and verbal).Ability to provide established standards of customer service.About the Team:Reporting directly to the workshop Foreman, you will be working in a fast-paced and diverse environment. What equips you for the role:Automobile related diploma/certificate.
At least 3 years of relevant experience.
Self-motivation Job Details
